alert.note: Alert for Scioto (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 03 at 5:52AM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF CENTRAL LEWIS AND SCIOTO COUNTIES THROUGH 615 AM EST... At 552 AM EST, a strong thunderstorm was located over Camp Dix, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph and very heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Visibility will be poor and hydroplaning is possible. Locations impacted include... Portsmouth, Wheelersburg, New Boston, Vanceburg, South Webster, Head of Grassy, Rosemount, Clarktown, Camp Dix, Franklin Furnace, Sciotodale, Saint Paul, Minford, Kinniconick, Friendship, Stricklett, Rexton, Firebrick, West Portsmouth and Haverhill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. Motorists should slow down and use extra caution. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
